attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To pass a law requiring any company/institution keeping identifiable personal data as described under the Data Protection Act to notify all parties’ effect should their unencrypted data be lost or compromised. This should be in the same way as adopted by the US Federal Government where data breach notification legislation is required. Also to ensure those who loose data exemplify those affected by free credit monitoring for a period of no less than 12 months. No one should be exempt including Government and Security Services.

rejection.details: Your name has been identified in the petition
reasons: The names of individuals, or information where they may be identified, in relation to criminal accusations
